column4: Ok guys got an issue, when using +4096MB i get value out of range in fdisk
partitioning and mounting are two separate things
/home should be type 82 or 83 (one is linux the other swap, forget which  is which)
thanx, yes  it is 83 that is Linux
you don't have that much space available most likely
this is a raid array of 2 disk each 150gb so there is 300gb of space and should be 25gb of unpartitioned space
ahh sorry - i can't help with RAID stuff.  good luck man.
is there a command to se how mutch is left?
when you use "n" for new with defaults what size does it create?  use "d" and the partition number to remove it (if you don't want it) - BE CAREFUL with this stuff!
blocks?  i'm not sure if that would be 4GB?
which brings me back to my first comment - not enough space most likely
yeah but, windows would not boot even close
